item.title: LeetCode[620] Not Boring Movies
item.description: Question X city opened a new cinema, many people would like to go to this cinema. The cinema also gives out a poster indicating the moviesâ€™ ratings and descriptions. Please write a SQL query to output movies with an odd numbered ID and a description that is not ‘boring’. Order the result by rating. For example, table cinema: +---------+-----------+--------------+-----------+ | id | movie | description | rating | +---------+-----------+--------------+-----------+ | 1 | War | great 3D | 8.
